meanings.definition: A person or group of people who linger or stay in a place longer than necessary.
meanings.sent1: The lingerers at the park enjoyed the sunshine.
meanings.sent2: The group of lingerers in the library made it difficult to find a quiet spot.
meanings.sent3: The lingerers at the buffet seemed determined to try every dish.
meanings.sent4: The office was filled with lingerers, reluctant to leave after the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The lingerers by the river watched the sunset in peaceful silence.

meanings.definition: The act of lingering or staying in a place longer than necessary.
meanings.sent1: The lingerers of the movie theater missed the last bus home.
meanings.sent2: After the concert, the lingerers chatted excitedly about their favorite songs.
meanings.sent3: The lingerers at the ice cream shop couldn't decide on a flavor.
meanings.sent4: The lingerers of the group hike enjoyed the scenic views along the trail.
meanings.sent5: The lingerers in the waiting room flipped through old magazines.
